channel.title: Raphael Lanouette - Live in a Yellow Room
channel.description: Live session for podcasting - Audio and Video

item.title: Yellow room's live session
item.description: This is a choosen live jam recorded with no computer and in my yellow room. Style varies from experimental noise to electroacoustic

item.title: A quick peek in the Yellow Room
item.itunes:author: Raphael Lanouette
item.description: The first minutes of a live in home studio session (or "how the vidcam went on low-batt and stopped recording the tape")
item.itunes:subtitle: Inside the Yellow Room
item.itunes:summary: The first minutes of a live in home studio session, recorded till the vidcam get on low-batt
item.itunes:keywords: live, music, studio, phonotheque, raphael, lanouette,experimental

item.title: Die.A.Riot on the phonotheque podcast!
item.description: A new classic in acoustic punk - Dancing Bruno - A piece of work by Kenny Laflamme and Bruno Fortier recorded in Banff, Alberta, Canada
